sources.title: Party 2000 S Moghaddam
sources.description: Synopsis Amin Haghi is a young writer who was accused to forgery of hand writings of his brother and sent to the prison. His wife as well as his friends try to prepare the bail demanded by the law court for the writer's temporary release. In spite of their efforts, they could not gather enough money for the requested bail, so one of them suggested a new way. Renting his house to the guys for their different ceremonies.. Cast: Hedieh Tehrani, Ali Mosafa, Mehdi Khayami, Sorosh Godarzi, Esmaiel Shangeleh, Saied Bozorgi, Mohammad Ghomi, Khosro Naji
